content.description: Start at the bottom right of the smooth overhang from a sit start. Traverse left onto the good sloper and make a big dynamic lunge to a sharp juggy ledge. Use the pocket and slopers to move up to the tallest point of the boulder for the sketchy top out.
content.protection:
3 pads and 2 spotters recommended 

  Uneven ground and a sketchy top-out makes good spotting a necessity.
content.location:
This is the only route on the boulder...so far 

  The start is right of the featureless low overhang on some little edges and pockets on a slight aret. 

  Walk off is around back

content.description:
This is the huge boulder nestled in the trees across the valley that is visible from the top of the hill next to Tweedy Bird Rock. 

  It has a rounded top and a steep face on the opposite side of the approach. 

  The quality is good down low and gets sandy at the top-out
